item.name: Processor 1 Load (mgmt)
item.description: The average, over the last minute, of the percentage of time that this processor was not idle. Implementations may approximate this one minute smoothing period if necessary.

item.name: Processor 2 Load (data)
item.description: The average, over the last minute, of the percentage of time that this processor was not idle. Implementations may approximate this one minute smoothing period if necessary.

item.name: Chassis type
item.description: Chassis type for this Palo Alto device.

item.name: App-ID Version
item.description: Currently installed application definition version. If no application definition is found, 0 is returned.

item.name: Global Protect Client Version
item.description: Currently installed global-protect client package version. If package is not installed, 0.0.0 is returned.

item.name: HA Mode
item.description: Current high-availability mode (disabled, active-passive, or active-active).

item.name: Serial Number
item.description: The serial number of the unit. If not available, an empty string is returned.

item.name: PAN-OS Version
item.description: Full software version. The first two components of the full version are the major and minor versions. The third component indicates the maintenance release number and the fourth, the build number.

item.name: Threat Version
item.description: Currently installed threat definition version. If no threat definition is found, 0 is returned.

item.name: URL Filtering Version
item.description: Currently installed URL filtering version. If no URL filtering is installed, 0 is returned.

item.name: System Description
item.description: A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software. It is mandatory that this only contain printable ASCII characters.

item.name: System Name
item.description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name.

item.name: System Uptime
item.description: The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

discovery_rule.name: $1 Discovery
discovery_rule.description: A textual description of physical entity. This object should contain a string that identifies the manufacturer's name for the physical entity, and should be set to a distinct value for each version or model of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE}

discovery_rule.name: $1 Discovery
discovery_rule.description: A textual description of physical entity. This object should contain a string that identifies the manufacturer's name for the physical entity, and should be set to a distinct value for each version or model of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: Operational status of {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: Discovery of alarm status at temperature sensor

trigger.name: CPU utilization on {HOST.HOST} is over 95% for 15 min
CPU utilization on {HOST.HOST} is over 95% for 15 min

trigger.expression: {Template Palo Alto Firewall:panSysSerialNumber.diff(0)}>0 and {Template Palo Alto Firewall:panSysSerialNumber.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

trigger.name: Global Protect Client Version has changed to {ITEM.VALUE}
PAN-OS version has changed to {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger.description: Operating system on a PA firewall has been upgraded or downgraded

trigger.name: URL Filtering Version has changed to {ITEM.VALUE}
{HOST.HOST} switched to {ITEM.VALUE} state in HA cluster
